ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot
Class PlotDrawer

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot.PlotDrawer
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlotDrawerBar, PlotDrawerCenter, PlotDrawerLine, PlotDrawerSolid
public abstract class PlotDrawer
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a way to draw different "styles" of plots.

Author:
aaron

Method Detail

drawPoint

public abstract void drawPoint(int base,
                               double heightInSlot,
                               SlotPath slotPath)
Draws out the next point on this plot. The points passed here should be in order of ascending base value.

Parameters:
base - The base to draw this point on.
heightInSlot - The height in the slot to draw the point (from -1 to 1).
slotPath - The path to draw into.

drawRange

public abstract void drawRange(int startBase,
                               int endBase,

Draws out a point in a given range.

Parameters:

endBase -
heightInSlot -
slotPath -

reset

public abstract void reset()
Resets this PlotDrawer so we can draw a new set of points.

finishPlotPoint

public abstract java.awt.Shape finishPlotPoint(SlotPath slotPath)
Adds finishing touches to this plot.

Parameters:
slotPath - The SlotPath we are drawing into.
Returns:
Shape The shape object for this plot.
